overview: The story of the oil leader Lázaro Pizarro, of his political and personal wars, the use of crime to settle conflicts and the course of his power between the basements and the domes of Mexican politics, have a narrative record made in the Gulf of accuracy and dexterity

production_companies.name: Cooperativa de Producción Cinematografica José Revueltas
Coordinación de Radio, Televisión y Cinematografia del Estado de Tlaxcala (CORACYT)

title: Dying in the Gulf
